title: [Feat]: teams-for-linux app could emit events when joining/leaving meeting for processing by other applications
body:
### Describe the feature

When I join or leave a meeting, the teams-for-linux app could emit an event so another application can subscribe to it and perform custom actions.

### Motivation

When working from home, I would utilize these events to turn on and off a busy-light at my office door while I participate in a meeting. That way, the spouse/kids in the house would know when not to enter the room.

### Alternatives

Closing/opening the door is somewhat cumbersome.
